abstract: The reading list from our design and living issue: books by Lou Beach, Blandine Vié, Allegra McEvedy and Gerhard Meier.
snippet: The reading list from our design and living issue: books by Lou Beach, Blandine Vié, Allegra McEvedy and Gerhard Meier.
lead_paragraph: Marvels of economy, the stories in Lou Beach's first collection, "420 Characters" (Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, $22), originated as Facebook status updates (and conform to the 420-character limit). One begins: "I had never used a chain saw."
